title: Rick Perry to Step Down as Energy Secretary
text:
Energy Secretary Rick Perry has told President Trump of his intention to leave the administration, which comes amid revelations that he reached out to Rudy Giuliani at the president’s direction to address concerns about alleged Ukrainian corruption.

Mr. Trump, who confirmed Mr. Perry’s decision, said he already has picked a new energy secretary, but has not disclosed the selection’s name. Mr. Perry plans to leave his post at the end of the year, according to another person familiar with the situation.
